name: AddNumbersinSeriesSequence-AddManynumbers
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: add numbers
des:
Open it by saying "Alexa, Open Add Numbers" 

Alexa will ask for first number, you can tell any number for example "5" 

Alexa will reply with number told by you with current total and will ask next number, suppose you tell "5" again 

Alexa will reply with "5. Total 10". and will ask for next number you can keep giving next numbers in this way. 

- Say numbers one after other, skill will tell the total
- Skill will tell the total after each number you add.
- Say "Reset" or "Restart" to start adding from 0 again, or to start new series.
- You can add as many numbers as you want

Add many numbers in a series or sequence.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
